creditline: Gift of Ruth and Bruce Dayton
description: yellow ground with blue decoration; floral spray at center; chased floral design on inner and outer rims
markings: Yung-cheng mark and period (1723-1735); 6-character Yongzheng mark and period, in blue, on bottom
medium: Porcelain with cobalt blue pigment under clear glaze with ground filled with yellow enamel over clear glaze
title: Yellow Ground Dish, one of a pair
